p: In cases where nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT) assay is negative and there is a strong doubt or epidemiological link to COVID-19 infection (travel to highly infected areasâ€¦etc.), paired serum samples (acute and convalescent-phase) could support the diagnosis. Cross-reactivity to other coronaviruses can be very challenging, but commercial and noncommercial serological tests are currently under development and evaluation [ 51].
